title: Learning health and wellness information accessibly
description: Learning health and wellness information accessibly
content:
Scenario: Learning health and wellness information accessibly
    Given Jordan wants to understand their own health better
    And health literacy supports self-advocacy
    When Jordan uses health education resources
    Then the personal_agent provides health information in simple language
    And medical concepts are explained with pictures and examples
    And Jordan can ask questions and explore topics at their pace
    And Jordan's health knowledge increases over time
    And Jordan becomes better able to participate in health decisions
    And Jordan's informed health participation is supported through accessible education
